artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Ōmiya Kyūjirō; Carver: Watanabe Eizō I
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
dimension: 14 1/2 × 9 3/4 in. (36.83 × 24.77 cm) (sheet, each, approx., vertical ōban triptych)
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳桐 {Yoshikiri} | Carver’s seal: 渡辺彫栄 {Watanabe Hori Ei} | Censor seal: 卯四改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: 一魁斎芳年筆 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi hitsu}
text: Related to the play Kujira obi nishiki no shingata九字成帯錦新襖, performed at the Morita Theater in the 4th month of 1867.
title: Actors Bandō Hikosaburō V as Tōma Saburōemon (R), Sawamura Tosshō II as Hayase Iori (C), and Ōtani Tomoemon V as Adachi Motoemon (L)
